id001.title: ERROR #001
id001.msgText: We are failed to finish your payment. Please contact our support to confirm about this. Thank you!

id004.title: ERROR #004
id004.msgText: We are failed to share your story to social media. Please try it later, or you can contact our support to confirm about this. Thank you!

id005.title: ERROR #005
id005.msgText: You need to login to this gift card to cart. Do you want to continue?

id007.title: CONGRATULATION
id007.msgText: You successfully shared your payment story to social media!

id008.title: CONGRATULATION
id008.msgText: You successfully emailed your payment story!

id009.title: ERROR #006
id009.msgText: We are failed to send the gift card to your friend. Please try it later, or you can contact our support to confirm about this. Thank you!
